SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_GETBATCHLOCKBYPROJECTID
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Sproc to get the BatchLock row by ProjectId
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Memphis
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
CREATE PROCEDURE USR_USP_GETBATCHLOCKBYPROJECTID -- Add the parameters for the stored procedure here @projectId uniqueidentifier -- ProjectId Guid of the lock row AS BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON;
select * from USR_BATCHLOCK where ProjectID = @projectId END
